hero.title: Hey, Its Josh!
hero.des0: I am a Senior Web developer with Acxiom.
hero.des1: I enjoy creating high-quality software products with a complex logic behind it.
hero.des2: My technology stack includes React, TypeScript and Node.
hero.des3: I am also currently learning more about Ethereum blockchain, cybersecurity and DevOps.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my most favourite projects that I enjoyed coding and designing from scratch.

fullstack.subtitle: User Authentication
fullstack.description: A fullstack application with user roles and admin roles.

horoscope.subtitle: API Consumption
horoscope.description: A React app utilizing a 3rd party API for showing horoscope info.

binary.subtitle: Search Visualization
binary.description: A binary versus linear search visualizer that displays the benefits and shortcomings of a binary and linear searches.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I am passionate about using cutting-edge technologies. These are the tools I am most familiar with and build things every day.

experience.title: Experience

contact.title: Wanna reach out?
contact.description: Feel free to drop me a message if you have some interesting offer or you want to hang out.

citation.content: Men are not creatures of circumstance, circumstances are the creatures of men.
citation.author: -Benjamin Desrali
